#### Title: 21537-230450B - Wood Chipper Services

#### Reference Number: WS3723119617

#### Amendment Number: 1

#### Publication Date: December 22, 2022

#### Closing Date: January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

This announcement invites sealed tenders from suppliers for the supply and delivery of a self-contained, towable wood chipper to the Correctional Service of Canada’s Bowden Institution in Red Deer County, Alberta. The wood chipper must be capable of chipping trees and brush with a trunk diameter of 9 inches or greater.

The tender is subject to a Request for Proposal (RFP) and procurement METHOD. It is a competitive process, where the lowest bidder will be selected. The bid submission must include all required supporting documentation.

The contract will commence on March 1, 2023, and will conclude on March 31, 2023. A debriefing session will be provided to bidders who request it, following the submission of their bids.

Please note that Ariba Discovery response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time have been disregarded. The new closing time is January 18, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bid submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Key Details:

* **Bid Reference Number:** WS3723119617
* **Bid Closing Date:** January 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Purchase Description:** Self-contained, towable “disc style” wood chipper to process trees and brush with a trunk diameter of 9 inches or greater
* **End User Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada, Bowden Institution
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Contact Information:**

Kwan, Eric (SPAC/PSPC)
eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
